website_summaries.verdict: An effective cleaner that is not too harsh and not too mild.
pros: Product goes from green to red as it loosens dust, dirt, and grime
Safe on paint and clear-coated wheels

customer_reviews.title: Most effective wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have a BMW M3, which comes with particularly aggressive brake pads. The amount of brake dust this generates is unbelievable... it only takes a few days for the wheels to become totally black. I've tried dozens of cleaners. My weekly cleaner is actually P21S Wheel Gel, which costs a fraction of the Sonax. But for heavy accumulation or a "deep clean" nothing is better than the Sonax. It has a chemical to dissolve iron, similar to other products like Iron X. Since brake dust is primarily ionized ferrous material from disc wear sticking to the disc, the dissolution of the iron is important to get a totally-clean look. Expensive stuff, but does exactly what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic bullet but better than most only by a small margin.
customer_reviews.text: I remember a lot of detailers raving about Sonax wheel cleaner. I bought a gal. I have to say my expectations were high but it sure didn't meet my expectations as I was told this thing will dissolve brake dust. Not much better than any other special brake dust wheel cleaners I have used in the past. One scary thing I noticed, wash your skin asap if any hits your skin. You can see blotchies on my skin. Maybe I am allergic to whatever is on their ingredients but man, I am a little surprised by it. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: What a miraculous product! I tried to clean my fiancé’s wheels with pressure wash, other cleaning products and nothing worked until this product and within seconds her wheels looked brand spanking new!
customer_reviews.author: Erman

customer_reviews.title: then this would work fine. But if you're trying to remove a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as effective as other reviewers are claiming, but it works acceptably well. Definitely NOT scrub-free; a decent amount of elbow grease is necessary to remove the caked-on grime. For the light dust and dirt, I suppose it might work without scrubbing. If you are the type that washes your car and wheels every week or two, then this would work fine. But if you're trying to remove a year of caked-on grime, this won't do the job. I expected a miracle product, but instead got just another average wheel cleaner, only this one is more expensive than most.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the finest cleaner on the market.
customer_reviews.text: It will take one look from your friends to say. "Did you buy some new wheels?". This stuff is absolutely amazing. For the full effect, dismount your wheel, spray the back. Go do something for 10 minutes. Wash with water, no scrubbing needed. Turn the rim face up, do it again. Do the rest of your rims, and don't forget the tire protectant when you reinstall them. This stuff will handle salt, road tar, off-road dirt and mud- you get it dirty, it comes clean. Where was this stuff when I was racing off-road?
customer_reviews.author: johnfcon

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I don't often rate anything five stars. After having tried almost every wheel cleaner made over the years that didn't work and finally finding one that DOES, that is worth making note. This stuff isn't cheap, but it works. It is much less expensive per/measure in this large container. I use this on BMW lace-style wheels. BMW pads are notorious for making a dust mess. They also happen to WORK well, which is why I use them. The result is a nasty looking wheel after only a short time driving. I do use a brush for the brazillion crevices in these wheels but I could not GET them clean without Sonax. Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: canyncarvr

customer_reviews.title: Read description and all info carefully
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. My rims are old and hard to clean ..but it really helped.. follow direction exactly.. and don’t get it on your skin or breathe it.. I just wish it gave more info about it being safe on the tires... my hubby said it was but you never know unless the seller says it in description. Read carefully As to the smell.. yep.. it’s exactly the same smell as the old perms that women used to curl hair , 40 yr. ago..
customer_reviews.author: amah

customer_reviews.title: THE best wheel cleaner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really is the best. Spray on dry wheels, let soak while I get the hose out, spray off when I start wetting the car down and the wheels are done. Takes all the brake dust and everything off. Every few washes I use my microfiber wheel brush and get the barrels and hard to reach places. I even bring it with me to the car was and spray the wheels before start (self wash not automatic). I bough the big jug and refill my squirt bottle as needed. Its a little spendy, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: gibbs_04

customer_reviews.title: worked only somewhat
customer_reviews.text: It is fancy German engineering product. I am not impressed by it changing color as it works. It better be more effective. It looks to me that Sonax is targeting only some type of dirt. My aluminum wheels had all kinds of dirt no them - both mineral and organic: soil, plant sap, road tar, break pads dust, clay, and iron rust from brake discs. Sonax was able to remove some of it, perhaps half or so. The remaining part stays no matter how long Sonax is left to treat it. Working with a brush helps to a point. Perhaps Sonax is good for mild cases when dirt did not get stubborn yet.
customer_reviews.author: SERGEI RUSAKOV

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this on my car and I thought it was just like all of the other wheel cleaners. Then came the rain, the mud, and then the sun. My car looked so horribly dirty... except for the damn tires! LOL It looked like the car didn't match the tires at all! The tires were gleaming and looked like they had just been washed and sprayed. I actually complained to my husband about it because I wanted the entire car to match in either cleanliness or filth. He actually looked at me and laughed. But he did wash my car the next day. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Styllwaters

customer_reviews.title: This think does not work Is garbage I apply it on my wheels as described and ...
customer_reviews.text: This think does not work Is garbage I apply it on my wheels as described and i left it for 10minutes then wash it I swear my wheels were still dirty plus the bottle it's so small now I want to return it it said this item is not elegible for return what a waste of $18 I don't know how people leave good reviews don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Beatris Elkhayari

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel spray I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This product really impresses me. The smell doesn't bother me... kind of like burnt rubber. But consider it works so well with no acid, that trade off is ok. If you have moderate brake dust from twp newer cars, this may last you about a month and a half if you wash every other week. From having brake calipers etched from previous sprays, I'm careful not to let this set too long or using just after a drive. Just follow this instructions and apply it to a cool surface, and it works well. If you wash often, you may not even have to a wheel brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is the best wheel cleaner I've ever used even better than Adam's
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised just how easily it removed the break dust making my wheels look fresh and new without scrubbing. Just spray and rinse, that's all you need. I used to use Adam's Wheel Cleaner because it gave me the best results compared to anything else I used, but now it looks like I found a new king! This cleans better than Adam's and also smells significantly better too! If there is one minor issue, this is a bit on the expensive side...again like Adam's Wheel Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mudig

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this cleaner out on my 5 year old rims on my Macan that I hadn't ever cleaned the interior side of the rims on. Application is easy, simply spraying on and avoiding overspray onto the paint. Seeing the iron run off in the color changing spray is kind of cool I'll say and it did well taking off a good bit, but this is not a 'no scrubbing' product. It did great breaking things down and making the deep cleaning easier and my rims have turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Ian L.

customer_reviews.title: Sonax killing it again.
customer_reviews.text: Having used a handful of other Iron removing wheel cleaners, so far I'm really impressed with the Sonax entry. Unlike many which have a VERY strong sulfur smell this one has a faint citrus scent which keeps you from being overwhelmed. As a result of the slightly weaker smell, I'd imagine it's slightly less aggressive than cleaners like Nanoskin Iron Free or other similar products BUT the biggest difference I've noticed is that this will not stain tires like others do while still dissolving Iron and making for a simple cleanup. And it's not a gallon - remember it's 5 liters so you get almost an extra quart of liquid over US manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Hard smell, and expensive for amount
customer_reviews.text: This stuff cleans everything, left over tire dressing , brake dust. No problem. Spray it on and let it sit. However. While I am a few feet Away, and spraying at the wheel at a distance, it causes my nose to open up and cough each and every time. It is that strong a chemical whatever they are using. Also, got less than a quarter of a bottle left and I washed my car maybe four times. That is expensive. Might be less if you have small wheels, but when you have large truck tires, it is $$$
customer_reviews.author: SNIPER-MAX

customer_reviews.title: It’s good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean my wheels with brake dust, I think it worked out great, but there is one problem. After spraying it to all four wheels, there is not much left remaining in the bottle, only 10% remaining after just one use. I was under the impression that one bottle can be used at least up to 5 to 6 times with each wheel washing. So I am a little disappointed given this one bottle cost $16.13, very expensive for how quickly it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Works, helps to scrub a little, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: First, this is pricy for a small bottle. Apart from that, there is something to be said for mechanical assistance (scrubbing with a brush) for improved cleaning performance. This was by far the best wheel cleaner I've used so far for the aluminum-composite wheels I have on my truck. They appeared stained by rust-colored brake dust and grime, and this cleaner made an enormous difference. Will buy again, but really wince at the price.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyVR6

customer_reviews.title: You might have to scrub the wheel with a brush to get off thick break dust
customer_reviews.text: Our 17” rim was completely caked in break dust (due to a binding caliper) - so bad you could barley scrape it off with a putty knife couple 16th of an “ thick in some places. I applied a coat of the spray and the whole rim turned purple/red I then brushed it all and washed it off - IT CAME OFF I couldn’t believe it looks better then new although I had to do a few coats/scrubbing 5*****
customer_reviews.author: Parker C. Nerat

customer_reviews.title: The smell is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This stinks really badly, that is the only complaint I have. It's a horrible, strong chemical smell. It cleans rims really well, like, incredibly well. The only complaint I have is that the smell is horrible. Other than that, its a great cleaner, I love how it changes from green to red.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on my old car were in bad shape, with 100,000 miles of brake dust, grease, and grime built up over years. This product is highly rated so I gave it a shot. Followed the instructions and I’d say it got my wheels looking maybe 25% better. I didn’t expect miracles, but a subsequent one-time application of a competitor’s product did get my wheels looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: 80s Kid

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean my 34 year old Mercedes wheels, they were REALLY dirty, had many thick layers of brake dust built up on the inside hoop and in the outside crevices, it took multiple applications and some scrubbing with a stiff nylon brush but it did something amazing: it got them clean of the decades old buildup. None of the other wheel cleaners Ive tried managed to do that, even cans of brake cleaner couldn’t make a dent in the buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be without this product now that I’ve found it!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down THE BEST tire cleaner I have ever used for tough dirt, brake dust, built up grime. Spray on, wait for it to turn red and hose off. For some grime etc. a second application or spot application maybe needed and possibly alittle scrub with a toothbrush or tire brush.... but your wheels will be cleaner than ever before.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLifeLivinLarge

customer_reviews.title: More than great
customer_reviews.text: More than great! My Audi’s Brembo brakes are very dusty and not easy to clean. I’ve used multiple brands of sprays and brushes and it wasn’t a simple process to clean the wheels, until I discovered this spray. In the attached images, you can see that I only sprayed the wheel, let it sit for 5 minutes or so, then rinsed it with water. No agitation or brush needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Not working!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the product today and used it. Piece of crap. My car is a 2012 and the wheels have been always maintained, besides the last year, year and a half when I slacked maintaining them. Followed the instructions and watched videos as well. The color barely turned red and they barely got cleaned. Spray the wheels again and scrub them with hot water and a brush. Still not completely clean. Do not believe the videos! the product is not working like that. Obviously can't return it. What a waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: Augustin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: If you don't clean your wheels on a regular basis, this will take care of the tough stuff. You may have to add a little elbow grease but it does the job. Spray it on and let it sit for a while before you start scrubbing. This is not a spray on rinse off type of product. Light brushing is required. I used this with a Speed Master wheel brush. Whatever doesn't come off after the first application, apply again and let stand a few minutes and try using a microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it works great but...
customer_reviews.text: Every detailer and car enthusiast raves about Sonax. Don't get me wrong, it works, and it looks cooler than any product while it works. But, IT REEKS. So much so that it's enough to make me never want to use it again. It's like a combination of puppy breath and baby vomit that's been mixed in a blender and microwaved for five minutes. It is horrendous to be around. Sure I could a little facemask thingy, or I could just use a product that also works great and doesn't smell like Chernobyl (such as Chemical Guys All Clean +).
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Did not do anything special. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have 20 inch bronze wheels that are always dull and only ever look good wet. This spray was recommended by my tire shop and has over 1k good reviews but I guess I got a bad bottle or something. I sprayed liberally on my bronze rims waited the 3-5 min and the green liquid never turned red. I even used a pressure washer while i read some reviews that used a hose just fine. I even tried on my dads truck steel wheels to see if it was the paint, but that did not change color either... It is a decent wheel cleaner but does the same as a bottle 1/3 of the price. Definitely not worth 15+
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: not much there
customer_reviews.text: Sonax didn't do much. I applied several applications and wore the bristles off a plastic scrub brush with little results. There was some loosening of the crud, so its not a total fail. I have a Toyota sienna, nothing complex. Standard OEM replacement pads, nothing high tech. For the money its not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: charles g

customer_reviews.title: It cleans wheels but actually cleans wheels
customer_reviews.text: Okay i heard this stuff was good... "Its vaguely expensive, what rubbish. All color changing wheel cleaners are the same, its all in the elbow grease" but then i gave it a shot. Boy howdy. Even caked on brake dust just sloughed right off after a couple minutes. Worth the extra penny.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot DePlanty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews for this product are very accurate so I don't have a whole lot to add. It is true that Sonax is somewhat expensive if you buy by the 16 oz container but the large size I bought will last a very long time( equal to 10 16 oz containers). Sonax cleans like no other product I have tried. The break dust washes off easily with a wet rag & hose after letting the spray sit for a few minutes. It is also true that you could remove the break dust with some elbow grease & soap & water but Sonax restores my rims to their original luster, something the other products did not come close to doing.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have stubborn brake dust, even if it's been there for a while, this stuff is the BOMB. You may need a scotch brite pad for the stubborn stuff but it does a fantastic job cleaning wheels. My husband has used many products and nothing has worked as well as this. Smaller bottle than what you would expect from a car parts store.
customer_reviews.author: Shopmom0829

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner I've used!
customer_reviews.text: After trying every off the shelf wheel cleaner, I went with the big guns. I'm glad I did. I tried an individual spray bottle first, and I was sold. I recommend getting a spray bottle to try and following the directions to the T on the back of the bottle. Keep the bottle since you'll be buying this next!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzles

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Impress In Cold Weather
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time today, 40 degrees out. Even with using a wheel brush, the wheels were not clean in the nooks and crannies and they were not all that bad to start with, not like the German car messes I've seen. Perhaps the cleaner needs some heat to work. I'll give it another chance in the Spring and finish the bottle but it's too expensive to be performing just ok.
customer_reviews.author: EdC

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel cleaner. Used it as a replacement for Iron-X on a heavily iron contaminated Porsche Cayenne in a pinch. Worked pretty well, not *as* good as Iron-X but still better than nothing. Definitely softened and loosened the particles up so I could pick it all up with some clay. Works great for the wheels, but it is a bit "expensive". The CG Diablo Wheel Gel is just as good without the iron reaction color-change, and is diluted so will last a LONG time (up to 4:1 dilution ratio, they recommend 3:1)
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: It’s Not the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK I have been washing my own cars for over 30 years . I have used all different products thought i give this a try on my 08 land rovers rims . Sprayed on waited 5 minutes rinsed off still. Looked the same , dirty . You need to scrub in order to remove all the chemical agent . Left my rims with a film on it . Best thing is soap and water with some elbow grease . All this stuff is all the same . Also smell is bad .
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: I like Sonax products
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well the first couple of times. Lately, it hasn't been turning from green to red in reaction to the brake dust and dirt residue. Still, it seems to clean well and I trust Sonax products on my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Colombo

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a product which works exactly as described. I have a german vehicle which is notorious for heavy brake dusting. If I go two weeks, my rims will take on a gun metal color because of the heavy brake dust. I use this product after 2-3 weeks and simply spray it on, wait and hose it off. I use a simple spray nozzle rather than a pressure washer like suggested. I would approximate it gets 90% of the dust off. If I used it more often it would probably get nearly off of it off, but because it is not cheap and you need to spray a decent amount on there it would get expensive quick.
customer_reviews.author: GatorGuy

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Ive used a lot of wheel cleaners but this one take the cake. Follow the directions and it will clean your wheel even the brake dust that is very hard to clean off the wheels. I will be using this Sonax Wheel Cleaner from now on. Its worth the money. If they are selling stock I would buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good wheel cleaner at twice the cost
customer_reviews.text: A good wheel cleaner at twice the cost. The Sonaz product works as well as other products in the category but it cost 2 to 3 times as much. As such I will stick with the cheaper product for the same result. It did not remove all the break dust even with a brush and gentle agitation.
customer_reviews.author: JR1234

customer_reviews.title: Full Effect
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what they put in this stuff but man it works. I was blown away the first time I used this on my cars wheels. Followed instructions and after rinsing the wheels looked like new. Wiped them off and job done. Especially great for rims that have a lot of brake dust on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price to remove serious years old grime!
customer_reviews.text: Serious muscle in this bottle! It is, by all means, worth the $20. Haven't cleaned my room in 10 years of owning them. Tried lots of other products and a lot of elbow grease with bad results. Spray this on and hit it with a little scrub brush and you get a great shine and the gunk just hoses off.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but the best wheel cleaner money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried pretty much every kind of wheel cleaner from every brand. This by far is the best and safest wheel cleaner. The only bad part is the price. It is super expensive compare to the good old soap and hand washing the wheel. I dont use this product every wash. I only use it for deep cleaning the brake dust off my Evo X wheels. After hard track day my white wheels are covered in dark brake dust. Sonax wheel cleaner can get 95% off just by spraying and rinsing ! you still have to use a wash mitt to get the 5% off Other products will get 60-70% of my brake dust off from spraying and rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. You spray it on the rims and wait a few minutes. It's green when you first spray it and it'll turn purple when it's ready to be washed off. It smells pretty good. It won't get everything completely off. Some spots you need to scrub or wipe down in, but it is better than just using soap and a scrub. It gets into the hard to reach places and makes cleaning the rims a lot easier. My only complaint is that it's very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: defaultTop Contributor: Travel Guides & Tips

customer_reviews.title: Will make a believer out of you
customer_reviews.text: Spray on and instantly see deep grime melt away. I'm not kidding, this stuff means business. Just make sure to have access to water to spray off the huge loads of junk that's about to melt off. It will dry on your wheels if you don't remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to be mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a few sets of wheels and I'm not impressed. It does ok with brake dust and poorly with road grime. Seems like a lot of reviewers get excited about the color changing when it reacts with brake dust which is the only reason I can see why this has such good reviews. For the price is rather get two bottles of the eagle wheel cleaner in the yellow container which did an equally good job on brake dust and better on road grime.
customer_reviews.author: Doodude

customer_reviews.title: I've been detailing cars for a little over 15 years and have tried all kinds of different products but have to say this is by far one of the best mass produced wheel cleaners on the market
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff! I've been detailing cars for a little over 15 years and have tried all kinds of different products but have to say this is by far one of the best mass produced wheel cleaners on the market. I seem to go thru the product pretty quickly but I do apply a heavy amount on my Wedssport rims to make sure I get the entire rim cleaned, not just the face of the rim. I'll buy this stuff for years until someone creates a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: The best wheel cleaner out there, works on all my wheels, the easily clean my truck XD monster wheels usually cary dirt from the sand and mud i drive through almost everyday, with little to no scrubing, they get brake dust of my audi wheels without any scrubbing whats so ever just wet wheel, spray generously, leave wheel to dwell for several minutes, clean of with pressure washer, and the wheel will be in like new condition, i also use it on my mustang, and marauder with alloy polished wheels, and my P71 steel powder coated black wheels, and i assure you its 100% safe on all surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: SFOD

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great.
customer_reviews.text: A good product but over-hyped and over priced. It cleans the wheels but no better than other cleaners off the shelf at a third the price and more readily available. I would rate Sonax on a par with Meguiar's Hot Rims cleaner. Both turn colors as they attack the dried brake dust. I had to order Sonax online as it is not available in local auto supplies or Wal Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Hackton

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel cleaner I've ever used, and I've used several brands. My Durango wheels hadn't been cleaned in many months, and they were filthy,. I got Sonax, sprayed the wheels one day and let it sit. Next day, I washed the wheels, applied another coat of Sonax, and lightly scrubbed with a Brillo pad. Only one pad was needed for all for wheels, since Sonax had loosened all the crud, grease, and brake filings. I rarely write reviews, but Sonax is worth one. This'll be my go-to wheel cleaner from now on...
customer_reviews.author: AbeVick

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!!
customer_reviews.text: False advertising it will not clean you’re wheels the way they advertised this I fallow the instructions step by step
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts because I’ve tried a lot of other brands and they didn’t impress me, but this product really works, I have a BMW and this cars produce a lot of break dust that are hard to clean after awhile, again first try and I’m hooked to this product i would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazónico V

customer_reviews.title: A wheel cleaner that ACTUALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Tried many a cleaner for wheels from the local auto store and was disappointed with each and every one. none of them really did much. saw a youtube video of this stuff being used so I thought I would try it. the test vehicle was my dads daily driver and the front wheels we really bad. did all 4 of them in about 10 minutes. did 2 applications. swished them briefly with a soft bristle wheel brush before rinsing them off. no polishing was done at all. before and after pics.
customer_reviews.author: cforcht

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is awesome! I tried using soap and water with a cordless drill brush attachment and I couldn't even tell any difference between before and after. The photos are the results of this wheel cleaner after spraying the rim and waiting 5 minutes and then rinsed off with water
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: hmm it works
customer_reviews.text: wow this is the first decon product i have used... coming from chemical guys wheel cleaning products.. stick orange and diablo and a third product that doesnt come to mind at the moment... this product wins hands down!!! be warned it stinks to high hell.. just peeeewwwww! with that said i find it to be a better buy than any of the chemical guy products i have bought.. thinking about buying this by the gallon.. before i do i am going to try some other decon products.. this one set the bar high
customer_reviews.author: boobookitty

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the old sonax plus, this is total junk. Barely does anything. Waste of money. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not magic
customer_reviews.text: To be fair it has been about a year since I’ve clean my rims well and I haul around a boat in the summer so get a lot of brake dust this did a pretty good job refuses to clean the stubborn spots after multiple applications and agitating with soft brush. Overall still works well just don’t expect the magic you see on some of the YouTube videos here picture of left wheel that I cleaned and right one that I have not touched yet for a before and after
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bailey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I've tried a lot of wheel cleaners over ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've tried a lot of wheel cleaners over the years and have pretty tough dust that comes off of the sintered brake pads I use. Also have gold rims so any left over grime really shows. I keep looking for a product and procedure that allows me to clean my wheels without any scrubbing - while this doesn't quite get me there, it does do a better job than most of the other stuff I have tried. After soaking with this for a few minutes and a strong pressure wash, only a few crevices need a wipe down to get completely clean. I'll probably buy this again as opposed to trying to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This product is unbelievable. Works wonderfully for cleaning up wheels, literally spray on let sit and spray off and the wheels look great. I would highly recommend this product. So much nicer than scrubbing wheels by hand, with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Stefmav1

customer_reviews.title: Thought that was bad because it could have exploded all over the box
customer_reviews.text: This item does at it says. Shipped fast, but came with no padding. Thought that was bad because it could have exploded all over the box. Mine was safe though upon arrival. This works and I like how it turns red after it starts working on the wheels. However, it really takes a lot to cover the entire wheel and the bottle is small. In addition, if you miss a spot, it will leave it black with brake dust making the wheels look really bad. Still great item though because the wheel cleaners at Walmart never seemed to work.
customer_reviews.author: TheHBIC

customer_reviews.title: Even year old brake dust is no challenge!
customer_reviews.text: I was suggested this product from a friend. Wow! I had very old brake dust on my front wheels and nothing would get it off. This stuff literally DISSOLVED those stains off the wheels and they wiped right off. Truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Philly Buster

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner out there, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best wheel cleaner I have ever used and I now swear by it. If you follow the directions you will get great results, I recommend some scrubbing of the hard to reach places and corners for perfect wheels, but even a no-scrub use will get you a very clean wheel. Only downside is you need a decent amount of it for each cleaning and it is very pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Manley

customer_reviews.title: good wheel cleaner with color change feature
customer_reviews.text: its really nice when you see the color changes. and you will potentially think its doing its cleaning job. in reality i found a good cleaner and a quality brush will do thousand times better job. and this product has a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tris P

customer_reviews.title: Had absololutly no affect on the brake dust
customer_reviews.text: Tried it once on caked on brake dust and it had no affect what so ever. Supposed to turn red. Never changed color. I was using it on 19 year old wheels. Maybe that was the problem. Wasted $18
customer_reviews.author: larry r jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad brake dust issues on my BMW 535i. I heard good reviews on the Sonax and wanted to give it a try. Have to say after a couple of tries it works fantastic. Couple this with a high pressure hose and there's virtually no scrubbing. The dust just rinses right off. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is the price. You don't get a lot of use out of one 17 oz bottle. I'm guessing maybe 8 wheels. That could get expensive really quick
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sonax works, but rinse thoroughly.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this does work very well, albeit it smells like the worst cat pee you'll ever experience in your life! However, it does clean the brakes/rotors and inside of wheels very well. It turns to a dark red/purple, and I highly recommend, when rinsing, to go under the car and shoot the wheels from behind as well, to fully rinse it. I've heard of some people diluting it, although I've never tried that. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Sonax has performed the best at removing and cleaning wheels of light to heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: From all the wheel cleaners I've tested thus far, Sonax has performed the best at removing and cleaning wheels of light to heavy brake dust build up. It didn't completely clean 8 years of neglected wheel rims but it was definitely a huge improvement and I plan to return to Sonax after testing more wheel cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: Beck C

customer_reviews.title: There's better out there....
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few rim cleaners and this one sits close to the bottom of the list. It seems like a weak formula and was out performed by several cleaners. The best one I have found is Meguiar's Ultimate Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: DelBoy

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many different wheels cleaners before but none of them can effectively remove those stubborn break dusts until I found out about this product. Simply spread on and wait until it turns to dark purple color and then rinse off to reveal the original appearance of the wheels. Make sure you read directions. It should be spread on while wheels are cold and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kang Chao

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap and takes a little scrubbing, but it works really well. Managed to remove brake dust stains off my Q5 wheels with little effort! Really strong smell, make sure you use in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning grime, dust, gun on the wheels of a car.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans wheels as what I expect it suppose to i.e. grime, dirt, gunk. Spray direct on the wheels, wait for 5 minutes before washing off with clean water. It would still leave a little bit of grime if it is there for awhile, so what I do I wash it off with soap and water and those grimes which were left behind will easily come off.
customer_reviews.author: mfpr5679

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT clean without scrubbing!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was too good to be true! Amazon touted this item as a great but not well-known item (with some other things, too) and I believe it was on Facebook. The wheel spray claims no scrubbing needed. Nope! As you can see in my pic it does need scrubbing. Very disappointed. Waste of money-
customer_reviews.author: Groover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results with old filthy wheels
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old Saab wheels looked like they had never been cleaned. I was especially concerned about how the silver paint looked like it was stained beyond repair. This wheel cleaner worked incredibly well. I had to use five or six applications, each time gently scrubbing with a wheel brush, but it took off all of the grime, and most impressively the staining is gone too. The wheels look nearly new.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed With This Wheel Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2007 Toyota Tundra Truck. It is my work truck and I treat it like a work truck. It gets washed about once or twice a year at a drive through car wash. The rims had so must dust and grime on them you couldn't tell that they are chrome. I sprayed Sonax on the rims waited about five minutes and brushed each one for about five minutes. About 90% of the dust and grime came off. With a little more effort I am certain I can get the wheels 100% clean. Sonax is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas DJ

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites. I would recommend this especially for people who do not like to odor of (Iron-X). I use both Iron-X and this product but in general maintenance washes, I use this product more often. This does not get rid of every single layer of brake dust as brake dusts layers on top of each other, so I would recommend people using this twice as needed or use an all purpose cleaner/car wash shampoo to make sure all brake dust is cleaned on each wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Requires scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: Very good to clean brake dust off wheels. Only issue I have is that you really need to put some effort into scrubbing the wheels. I wish it were more of a spray on wash off product.
customer_reviews.author: bdepalo

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: This is very expensive but works well. It doesn't remove brake dust that's been chemically bonded to the paint/wheel. Any kind of racing pads will produce a dust that quickly etches into the finish and even this product (as good as it is) doesn't remove it very well. Maybe some will come off but not all. There's another product which is similar and changes color the same way and is a little cheaper. Can't recall the name but saw it on a youtube video from some detailer. It was only a couple of dollars difference but over time would amount to a lot. This bottle is somewhat smaller than I expected. You will go through it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sobrian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My SL500 has beautiful wheels, but the brake dust was ruining the looks making wheels black and dirty looking. Spraying this on, letting sit for 5 mins, and spraying with a high pressure hose did the trick! My wheels look new again! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mapman

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this wheel cleaner. I have a 2008 BMW 550i M Sport and the wheels have never been easy to clean. I was using hot rims and mothers and found hot rims to work well but I always had to scrub my wheels afterwards. Mother's is just not worth the cost. Sonax works extremely well, I still have to scrub but the dirt and brake dust come off easily. I also don't use as much spray. Finally, there are some that claim that the smell from this cleaner is horrible but I found it to be acceptable and not at all offensive. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joey E.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful cleaner. You should definitely wear gloves like recommended. I got a little bit on my arm and it started to burn and become irrated very quickly. Don’t let product stay on the wheel to long. In videos on YouTube they show product being sprayed on and then being hosed off. I would recommend using a brush to make this more effective. The only negative is the high price....
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works exactly the way I was hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works exactly the way I was hoping it would. Cleans very well without being extremely aggressive. If your wheels have been neglected it's possible you will need to use clean the wheels twice. If you maintain you wheels this product works perfectly each and every time. The only reason I did not give this 5 stars is the smell is a bit too strong for my nose. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: to get the best clean possible
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleaner for my Forgestar f14 rims for a couple of years now, and it works perfectly. Obviously, to get the best clean possible, you are still going to need to scrub your rims a little bit, but this product really loosens up all of the brake dust and dirt to get that nice clean that I always want. Just a pointer, keep the cleaner on for the recommended time, don't wash it away too early. Watching the green/yellow color change to red still excites me every single time.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Must buy product if you want a quick and easy way of making your wheels look pretty.
customer_reviews.text: My dad didn't believe I needed this stuff and I just needed some steel wool and elbow grease. I sprayed the stuff on my wheels, used a tire brush (my wheels needed it). Almost all the brake dust was gone. I had a lot so I would need to do another application when I wash my car next. I proved my dad wrong :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money. My rims are less than a year old on my truck and aren’t even all that bad on a new truck as well . this didn’t even phase any of the dirt grime and grease. I could still run my finger off and it was covered in black crime as well as I had to pressure clean my driveway because of the stains from the chemical on my driveway were so bad
customer_reviews.author: Jared J De Sane

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders. I was sceptical about it but I wasn't disappointed. Took all of the hard elbow grease needed to get rims clean. I am very impressed The only thing I have to complain about is the value for the money. I used about half a bottle on my truck rims.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well, but doesn't go far.
customer_reviews.text: One bottle will clean your wheels maybe twice (8 wheels). So it's better used for when your wheels are really gross. But it does work amazingly well. It cleaned a winters worth (no snow/ice/salt) of brake dust and grime in one application.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this is a very odorous cleaner. It may do a better job with BADLY coated wheels, but it does not just cause EVERYTHING to fall off the wheel. There may still be some dirty spots.
customer_reviews.author: B Shuford

customer_reviews.title: Sonax, enough said.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a wheel cleaner that really works, Sonax is it. I've used Sonax products for years on my VW and Audi vehicles. Sprays on light, translucent green, when it's done working it's purple. Spray off with garden hose, done. Spotless, gleaming wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Psiotic

customer_reviews.title: Gets in the crevices
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping I could just spray on and be done. Pink residue makes it necessary to clean them so I only spray it in now before I go through a car wash. Really works though.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Tofte

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not worth the cost over other cleaners for heavily soiled wheels
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. This cleaner was a little more effective than using soap and water and/or other wheel cleaners I've tried, and for that reason I like it; However, the price difference over other cleaners is not as palatable given the marginally superior results. I still had to put in a fair amount of scrubbing to clean my wheels. Given the amount of scrubbing I had to do to get my wheels clean, I believe any decent wheel cleaner would have given similar results. Granted, my wheels were very dirty, but for the cost of this product compared to others I expected better results from the initial application before scrubbing. Perhaps my expectations were too high.
customer_reviews.author: Deesiel678

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves the Brake Dust. Spray, Wait, Hose With Water, Let Air Dry, Done.
customer_reviews.text: I have another wheel cleaner but doesn't really work well. Sonax works as advertised, and so long as you spray it on the wheel (my rims require spraying different angles to get full coverage), it essentially dissolves the brake dust and rinsing with the hose did the trick. So for a minimal effort no rubbing or manually cleaning the rims, this is great. There is a pretty noticable smell to it though, so I use it outside, well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my wheels nicely but the fumes are awful
customer_reviews.text: The forums recommended Sonax as the best way to clean stubborn brake dust from alloy wheels and they were right. This stuff did a very good, but not perfect, job of cleaning up my winter wheels before I put them away for the summer. Good enough that I had to put in very little work to get them completely clean. I've already recommended it to friends. Heads up: Sonax puts off some terrible fumes - smells very caustic. Be sure to use it outside or with excellent ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: NeilR

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the bottle arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, melted the dust and grease right off of my BBS wheels. But the pump on the bottle was broken so half came out from the nozzle and the other half spilled out of the bottom on the ground. For really stuck on dust try spraying on, let it sit, scrub with Mr. Clean Magic Erasers then pressure wash.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M

customer_reviews.title: THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST WHEEL CLEANER EVER! I've used just about every major high-quality wheel cleaner in the past 30 years. None has come close to Sonax! I waited until the wheels were particularly filthy - rain, tons of baked on brake dust, dirt from canyon carving, every environmental pollutant the 405 has to offer - Sonax killed them all! This item is pricey but it is worth it when it truly is needed. I would advice the buyer to keep their wheels clean with car shampoo and water, but when you really need those wheels to be on fleek, USE SONAX!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product ! Will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, got all the grime and dirt off my rims. A detail gone wrong left my rims black as night after the tire shine leaked onto my rims. Thos did the trick and my rims are glistening !
customer_reviews.author: KD_PE

customer_reviews.title: Best Wheel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because when you spray on your wheels, it turns red when it makes contact with brake dust. Very easy to use! I keep my wheels looking fresh with this and minimal scrubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: great for break dust but don't shine like you'd hope it would
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really shine all that great. Does a good job of getting the break dust off rims. But you will still need to shine and get into the sharp corners of the rim
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wheel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works exactly as promised. When you spray it on, the color changes to blood red to let you know it's ready to be washed off. I also use Simple Green on my wheels and the Sonax requires less brushing to remove the dirt on the wheels. My only complaint is that you go through this stuff pretty quickly (especially if you have brakes that throw off a lot of brake dust) and it can get pricey to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: aestrada19

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Rim Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing it takes off brake dust and other grim like nothing else I have used. You just spray it on the rim let it sit for 5 minutes and spray it off with a hose. If it is real dirty I suggest using a brush or wheel woolies to really clean those rims up good and wipe them off with a microfiber or terry cloth towel. It makes them look as good as new and not harsh on the finish of the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I was very much hoping this would help me with my intricate Porsche rims - it does dissolve the grime, but I still have to scrub to get them clean - not exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Subsahara

product_meta.title: Sonax (230200-755) Wheel Cleaner Full Effect - 16.9 fl. oz.,Silver
product_meta.description: Size:16.9 fl. oz.Acid-free, pH balanced formula is safe on all wheels and won't damage wheels. Safe on various wheel finishes including: Chrome, Aluminum, Steel, Clear Coated, PVD, Painted, Plastic Wheel Covers, Magnesium, AND Aftermarket Wheels. Watch the color changing activate when it comes in contact with the ferrous metals (iron) from brake dust or other dirt and grime. Full Effect sprays on fluorescent yellow, then turns deep red or purple as it dissolves brake dust. The advanced and effective chemistry in Full Effect wheel cleaner attaches and emulsifies stubborn baked on brake dust. Simply spray on, let it dwell, watch for color change, agitate if necessary, and rinse with water. For best results rinse using high pressure water. Full Effect is great for both the DIY (do-it-yourself) and the professional. Effortlessly achieve shining wheels that will make your vehicle look like it just rolled off the showroom floor. Full Effect needs to be used on cool and dry wheels. Product is ready to use, do not dilute with water. *Use caution when applying this product to anodized wheels and brake systems - test in an inconspicuous area prior to use. Use Sonax Wheel Cleaner to safely clean dirt and brake dust on hard to reach wheel barrels and calipers, too.
feature_bullets: SAFE ON ALL WHEELS: Acid-free, pH balanced formula won't damage wheels. Safe on various wheel finishes including: Chrome, Aluminum, Steel, Clear Coated, PVD, Painted, Plastic Wheel Covers, Magnesium, AND Aftermarket Wheels

WATCH IT WORK: The color changing formula activates when it comes in contact with the ferrous metals (iron) from brake dust or other dirt and grime. Full Effect sprays on fluorescent yellow, then turns deep red or purple as it dissolves brake dust

ADVANCED AND EFFECTIVE CHEMISTRY: Full Effect, non acid wheel cleaner attaches and emulsifies stubborn baked on brake dust. Simply spray on, let it dwell, watch for color change, agitate if necessary, and rinse with water. *For best results rinse using high pressure water
Full Effect is great for both the DIY (do-it-yourself) and the professional. Effortlessly achieve shining wheels that will make your vehicle look like it just rolled off the showroom floor

Full Effect needs to be used on cool and dry wheels. Product is ready to use, do not dilute with water. *Use caution when applying this product to anodized wheels and brake systems - test in an inconspicuous area prior to use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,180 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
